summary:
Tridax is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae.Tridax is native primarily to the tropical regions of North and South America. Tridax procumbens has become naturalized in the southern United States and is considered a noxious weed in some places. 

Species
formerly includedsee Calea Layia Sabazia 

Tridax accedens - Calea verticillata
Tridax ehrenbergii  - Sabazia sarmentosa
Tridax gaillardioides  - Layia gaillardioides
Tridax verticillata  - Calea verticillata
